scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes an 10.5 inch by 8 inch spiral notebook. Notebook contains diary entries (dated April 16, April 19, April 20, and May 18, 1971) and fragments of a modern-day, possibly Appalachian, story with the following characters: Lulu, Noble, Jim, Mrs. Colyer, Joyce and Jade, Lonnie, Mr. Atkins, Joe Ann, Jackie, Jimmy, and Jasper. Notebook includes Chapters with numbering VII or VIII, IX or X, X or XI, VII or VIII, and IX or X. Pages 257-304 of the same notebook have been removed and placed in Belle notebooks (Box 45, Folder 8).
